grackle:StanceAloft.NAME: Aloft
DESCRIPTION: Gain 75% more block and deal 25% less damage. Gain 1 energy when you exit this stance.
Card may only be played while aloft

grackle:StanceEagle.NAME: Eagle
DESCRIPTION: Gain %d Pecking Order when you exit this stance.

grackle:StanceNest.NAME: Nest
DESCRIPTION: Gain %d energy when you enter this stance.

grackle:StancePhoenix.NAME: Phoenix
DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn regain 10% of your Max HP and take another turn.
